actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: A concurrent resolution opposing any delay in scheduled cost-of-living adjustments for Social Security and Veterans' pension recipients without a corresponding and equal deferral of or delay in the effective date of the Windfall Profit Tax provisions and Individual Income Tax Reduction provisions for taxpayers with an annual adjusted gross income of $50,000 or more contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Opposes the delay of cost of living adjustments to social security and veterans' pension benefits without a corresponding and equal delay of the effective date of windfall profit tax provisions and individual income tax reduction provisions applicable to taxpayers with an annual adjusted gross income of $50,000 or more contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution opposing any delay in scheduled cost-of-living adjustments for Social Security and Veterans' pension recipients without a corresponding and equal deferral of or delay in the effective date of the Windfall Profit Tax provisions and Individual Income Tax Reduction provisions for taxpayers with an annual adjusted gross income of $50,000 or more contained in the Economic Recovery Tax Act of 1981.
